Name: Firefly Studio
About the game: Firefly Studio is a Virtual YouTuber software. In addition to supporting model import and motion capture, the software also provides beautiful and powerful 3D scenes for users to use. In the 3D scene, operations such as lighting control, screen control, etc. can be performed to make your virtual image more realistic. What can be done? - 3D scene: Provides built-in beautiful and powerful scenes and can be manipulated, such as activity room (supports whiteboard output control, photo frame output control, lighting control, time control, etc.), stage (supports output control of both sides of the screen, multiple groups of lighting controls) Wait) - Model import: Supports 3D (VRM) and 2D (Live2D, paid DLC) model import, and supports operations such as moving, zooming, etc. - Facial capture: With iOS devices that support ARKit, high-precision facial motion capture is performed and presented on the model in real time Contact us If you have any questions or ideas in use, you can join our QQ group: 672728738 to communicate
Developers: 杭州美登科技股份有限公司
Publishers: 杭州美登科技股份有限公司
